column4: it's really getting weird! my folders show nothing inside them, although just one second ago, i was accessing files within them...
does somebody know what fspot is?
fspot is an image managing program. it makes databases of your images, albums and stuff
i know that several cardreaders built in on laptops dont work *_for certain type of cards_*
eg they dont recognise xd cards, although they accept them
: is there any forum/site about these problems with sd-cards?
the gentoo wiki just lists what works and what not
ok, i'll try that to see at least in what category is my card
yes i said that, is there something i didn't get?
if it works with one SD card, it will work with all SD cards
ok, i only have one SD card, it worked once or twice, but most of the time it doesn't
http://gentoo-wiki.com/HP_Pavilion_dv6850el scroll down and look at a table with the laptops specifications and what works
: ok, i checked on the page. it seems the sd card reader is supported on other laptops and was not tested on mine on this wiki
: sorry, take your time, there is no rush
or any other else : i have this problem with sd-cards on my laptop
